metadata.title: CVE-2018-15160 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The libesedb_catalog_definition_read function in libesedb_catalog_definition.c in libesedb through 2018-04-01 allows remote attackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via a crafted esedb file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHub issue comments.

criterions.comment: libesedb package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
